field.name: MajorVersionNum
field.description: Major Version Number (MJR): Indicates the major version is "1"

field.name: MinorVersionNum
field.description: Minor Version Number (MNR): Indicates the minor version is "0"

field.name: MemSSMemType
field.description: Memory Type - One-hot encoded: xxxx xxx1b = DDR4

field.name: MemSSNumCh
field.description: Number of DDR channels. One-based counting

field.name: DecErr
field.description: This field is set to ‘1’ when Memory Sub-System returns AXI response DECERR

field.name: SlvErr
field.description: This field is set to ‘1’ when Memory Sub-System returns AXI response SLVERR

field.name: EFFMON_START
field.description: Write a “1” to enable efficiency monitor and write a “0” to disable.

field.name: EFFMON_CYCLE_COUNT
field.description: Number of clock cycles after first command on interface

register.name: EFFMON_COUNT_SAT_CH0
register.description: Channel 0 Efficiency Monitor Cycle Counter Saturation

field.name: EFFMON_COUNTER_SAT
field.description: "1" if EFFMON_CYCLE_COUNT has saturated the max, otherwise "0"

field.name: EFFMON_RVALID_COUNTER
field.description: Number of read valid signals issued

field.name: EFFMON_TRANSF_COUNT
field.description: Number of cycles where read/write are asserted or read valid is asserted

field.name: EFFMON_CMD_WAIT_COUNT
field.description: Number of cycles where backpressure is high during command

field.name: EFFMON_NO_RVALID_CNT
field.description: Number of cycles where readdatavalid is low after a read has been issued

field.name: EFFMON_MASTER_IDLE_COUNT
field.description: Number of cycles where there is no read or write from the master after the first command (read or write) has been issued on the interface

field.name: EFFMON_WRIDLE_COUNT
field.description: Number of cycles in a write burst where there is no write from master

field.name: EFFMON_STATUS_CLEAR
field.description: Write "1" to clear all EFFMON status registers
